Ptack was a Netherese arcanist and spell inventor who lived during the Shadowed Age.
Ptack developed five spells during their life, all within a two year period. The spells they invented were crystalbrittle and knock in , and secret page, nondetection, and wizard lock (which was used to upgrade the quality of a lock) in .
